title: Udai Ramachandran:  Azure Private Link
description:
This is a recording of the May 26, 2022 meeting.

Azure Private Link provides private connectivity from a virtual network to Azure platform as a service (PaaS), customer-owned, or Microsoft partner services. This session will deep dive into the following topics:

    Private Endpoints
    Private Links

About toe speaker:
Udaiappa Ramachandran (Udai - https://udai.io) is the CTO at Akumina, a Microsoft Azure MVP, Cloud Expert, Organizer of the New Hampshire Cloud .NET User Group, and Speaker.
